chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:

Randomly disconnects from calls
Stays frozen on an app, forcing me to restart it
The Wi-Fi logo is active but doesn't always work

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair or replacement, the 07/06/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 12/06/2024, we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,

Emmanuel from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock to process an exchange. I have proceeded with a refund instead.

Regards,
RK
